why does it insist on dowloading the subs? i use utorrent and told it not to download any of the extra bs beside the avi's and its downloading alot of that crap anyway? Why?

Because torrents are downloaded in blocks of data that do not end on the logical beginning or ending of specific files.  Part or all of the adjoining files may also be retrieved even if they aren't selected to dl, as they reside in the the same first or last block as the files you have selected to download.
